document_data.name: The Dragon's Jaws
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dragon's Jaws''' was popular tavern found in [[Suzail]] in the {{YearlinkName|1358}}.
document_data.Location: The tavern was located in the heart of the city along the [[Promenade (Suzail)|Promenade]] right across from the royal court.
document_data.Activities: The Dragon's Jaws was a famous place to hold meetings and business dealings. A fair amount of gossip could be learned here as well. Both the food and wine selection were praised by Suzailans.
document_data.History: The tavern acquired its current name when a [[wizard]] from [[Thay]] met their end here after picking a fight with a [[gold dragon]] disguised as a woman.
document_data.Rumors & Legens: Secret tunnels and passageways connected the tavern with the court and palace.
